aboutContain.title: See what we do in action!
aboutContain.description: People Connect EAP is BBD’s counselling resource centre to help tackle personal and workplace health.

servicepageData.subtitle: Our 7 core elements
servicepageData.title: Manage everyday work, health and life challenges
servicepageData.description: BBD offers personalized, virtual well-being support to you and your family members. The service also provides a variety of care options, easy booking and a counsellor matching service to make sure your preferences are prioritized.

serviceBoxData.title: Mental health support
serviceBoxData.description: Easy to use EAP, virtual or in your local community, we have registered counsellors and therapists that support short and long-term needs.

serviceBoxData.title: Work, health and life services
serviceBoxData.description: Personalized, short-term support to assist with day-to- day work-life challenges such as health coaching, financial services, mental health support, and more.

serviceBoxData.title: Resource blog
serviceBoxData.description: Articles and podcasts, videos on mental health topics.

serviceBoxData.title: iCBT Self-Help Learning
serviceBoxData.description: Online multi-week learning modules, based on Cognitive Behavioural Therapy to help us drive our own behaviour change. Work independently and improve your wellbeing.

serviceBoxData.title: Self-Assessment Tool
serviceBoxData.description: Proprietary Diagnostic and Statistical Manual (DSM) based mental health self-assessment tool.

serviceBoxData.title: People connect continued therapy
serviceBoxData.description: Seamlessly transition to longer term care with your therapist. Support may continue through the paramedical practitioner category of your benefits plan.

serviceBoxData.title: Psychiatric collaboration
serviceBoxData.description: Virtual psychiatric collaboration for cases requiring additional support.

TestimonialData.contain: Today’s world and modern life are increasingly filled with uncertainty, complicated relationships, and frequent change. Employers need assistance creating mentally healthy workplaces and employees need easy access to help for mental concerns. Employees do not need to suffer in silence: feeling empty, withdrawn, and unsettled without sufficient support and help.
